verses.roman:
bhaṭṭācārya āsi' prabhure dhari' vasāila
mleccha-gaṇa dekhi' mahāprabhura 'bāhya' haila

synonyms: bhaṭṭācārya—Bhaṭṭācārya; āsi'-immediately coming near; prabhure—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; dhari'-taking; vasāila—made to sit; mleccha-gaṇa dekhi'-seeing the Mohammedan soldiers; mahāprabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; bāhya—external consciousness; haila—there was.
translation: At that time, Balabhadra Bhaṭṭācārya went to Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu and made Him sit down. Seeing the Mohammedan soldiers, the Lord regained His normal senses.
